title: ethanai inbamgaL
sahitya:
ettanai inbangal vaittanai tAyE inda iyarkkai ulaginilE 



anupallavi



attanai inbam pushittiDan vAzhkkai Ananda kAviyam AgumE



caraNam 1



muttai parappiDum vAnattil vaLar mOhana candiran mOhanattil

nartanam Adidum minnalil ammA jnAna maNittiraL minnudE



caraNam 2



ponmayak-kAlai mukhattilE kadir pUttu shollippadaik-kaNDadum

ennuLLattil aruL UrudE adil inba maNaveri ErudE ammA
